      • concatFilter

        private static void concatFilter(java.io.File outputFile,
                java.io.File progressFile,
                java.util.List<NavItem> items,
                int duration)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        This method expects the first stream is the video and the second one is audio. Ignores others.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • concatDemuxerFieldsMatch

        public static boolean concatDemuxerFieldsMatch(VideoStream va1,
                               VideoStream va2)
        Check if the required fields match for both VideoAttributes. The required fields are:
        • Width
        • Height
        • Aspect ration
        • Codec tag
        • TBN
        • TBC
        • TBR
        Returns:
        true if the required field set matches
